hooks.command:
cat << 'EOF'

===== Multi-Agent System 활성화 =====

21개 전문 에이전트와 28개 스킬이 로드되었습니다.

[Agents]
- Pipeline: requirements-analyst, plan-architect, orchestrator
- Execution: git-ops, backend-dev, frontend-dev, ai-expert, devops-engineer, database-expert
- Quality: qa-planner, qa-executor, code-reviewer, security-analyst, pr-reviewer

[Skills]
- Git: /git_commit, /git_branch, /git_pr, /git_analyze
- Dev: /python_setup, /fastapi_setup, /react_setup, /spring_boot_setup
- Quality: /test_runner, /coverage_report

[자동 트리거]
- 'commit', 'branch', 'git' → git-ops
- 'test', '테스트', 'QA' → qa-planner
- 'review', '리뷰' → code-reviewer
- 'security', '보안' → security-analyst

==========================================

EOF
